title: New packaging is RIDICULOUS...
content: The new packaging of this product is horrible. It is impossible to find the size of tampon you need, even worse if you are in a hurry. I do not have time to learn colors of the sizes, nor, search for a ”Letter”, as if I am in grade school, when most of them are missing on the wrappers. Whomever decided on this new design, is certainly incompetent of successful advertising.
